comm with ranch dressing that's right

someone came forward and showed America

by the way check it out I just dumped it

rest of the highly secret ingredients
and we're going to start with some onion
and garlic but not fresh we're going to

and this is one of those instances where
the dry powder actually is going to work
better than the fresh stuff it's going
to be much more stable in this the
flavor is going to stay consistent as
raw garlic and onions sit in a dressing
they can change over time so the powder
is a good way to go here by the way
that's not garlic salt and onion salt so
